author: arnetheduck
content:
good progress on decoupling the blobs - the only remaining significant TODO is the case of the proposer sending multiple invalid and one valid blob for the same index to the network and thus preventing _some_ peers from ever seeing the proposed block and thus inducing partitions which is somewhat unfortunate  - there are a couple of ways to handle this:

* allow unlimited blobs to be published to the gossip topic (this prevents the network split but opens up for spam)
* allow N blobs per index (reduces split risk, caps bandwidth)
* allow single blob per index (probably fine but some split risk)
* clear seen list from invalid blobs, _after_ recovering valid blob with dedicated requests (solves split problem, eventually reaches "correct" distribution, somewhat novel construct because we generally don't clear seen lists like that)

more information here: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3244#discussion_r1102486162

there are a few other minor naming and spec points open, as can be seen from the unresolved comments - don't miss the low-effort opportunity to join some of the naming contests as well!
